process.factory

Class ThompsonAutomatonFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • process.factory.ThompsonAutomatonFactory

  • public class ThompsonAutomatonFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class that permits to create multiple Thompson's automatons from already existing automatons
    Author:
    Aldric Vitali Silvestre

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThompsonAutomatonFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • createLetterAutomaton

        public static Automaton createLetterAutomaton(char character)
        Create an automaton that accept one character. An empty word can be created with the character AutomatonConstants.EPSILON_CHAR
        Parameters:
        character - the caracter to accept in the automaton
        Returns:
        the desired automaton

      • createConcatenationAutomaton

        public static Automaton createConcatenationAutomaton(Automaton automaton1,
                                                     Automaton automaton2)
        Create the concatenation between two Thompson's automatons (accept "A1.A2"). This creates brand new automaton which have not any connections with the 2 others.

        We suppose that those automatons have only 1 inital state and one final state (they are normalized).

        Parameters:
        automaton1 - the first automaton
        automaton2 - the second automaton
        Returns:
        the concatenation between both automatons

      • createUnionAutomaton

        public static Automaton createUnionAutomaton(Automaton automaton1,
                                             Automaton automaton2)
        Create the union between two Thompson's automatons (accept "A1+A2"). This creates a brand new automaton which doesn't have any connections with the 2 others.

        We suppose that those automatons have only 1 inital state and one final state (they are normalized), else, unexpected behavior will occur.

        Parameters:
        automaton1 - the first automaton
        automaton2 - the second automaton
        Returns:
        the concatenation between both automatons

      • createStarAutomaton

        public static Automaton createStarAutomaton(Automaton automaton)
        Create the repetition of a Thompson's automaton (accept "A*"). This creates a brand new automaton which doesn't have any connections with the original.

        We suppose that this automaton have only 1 inital state and one final state (normalized), else, unexpected behavior will occur.

        Parameters:
        automaton - the automaton
        Returns:
        the concatenation between both automatons
